hero.title: Paris Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Configured for strike-era rerouting, station complexity, and airport transfer reliability.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Arrival planning must include a transit and taxi backup simultaneously.
actions: Map airport rail and road alternatives in advance.
Store address and neighborhood fallback landmarks offline.
Use arrival window buffer before first reservation.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Use district-based routing during service disruption days.
actions: Set one bus or walkable substitute for critical metro segments.
Protect outbound airport transfer with extra margin.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Preserve payment continuity and data access in underground or low-signal zones.
actions: Carry one backup card and emergency cash layer.
Cache language support phrases and booking IDs.
Use low-battery map profile while commuting.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: When labor actions or weather stack delays, simplify route count and cut transfers.
actions: Move to fewer, denser activity blocks.
Escalate rebooking decisions earlier in the day.
